sentences.english: Walk around Richmond, the American International University in London.
sentences.chinese: 里士满伦敦美国国际大学校园行。

sentences.english: Hampton Court Palace in the London Borough of Richmond upon Thames. (Jason Hawkes)
sentences.chinese: 汉普敦皇宫，泰晤士河畔里士满，伦敦。

sentences.english: The writer is an associate professor of political science at the University of Richmond.
sentences.chinese: 作者系里士满大学政治学系副教授。

sentences.english: He galloped over the winter - dried grass of Richmond Park .
sentences.chinese: 他在里士满公园冬天冻枯了的草场上驰骋起来。

sentences.english: The author is Economist and Vice President of the Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond.
sentences.chinese: 作者是经济学家，并担任里士满联邦储备银行副主席。

sentences.english: Sands had been trading in Kidder Peabody 's Richmond office.
sentences.chinese: 桑兹过去在基德公司里士满分公司交易。

sentences.english: Asland is a small town about eight kilometres from the city of Richmond.
sentences.chinese: 阿什兰德是一个离里士满市大约八公里的小镇。

sentences.english: Then she returned to Point Richmond to check on the house.
sentences.chinese: 后来他们又回到里士满点查看他们的房子。

sentences.english: I live on the other side in neighborhood called Outer Richmond,
sentences.chinese: 我住在相邻的另一端，外里士满区。

sentences.english: Liu Jie was born in Richmond City—the Capital of Virginia State.
sentences.chinese: 刘洁是出生于美国弗吉尼亚州首府里士满市的华裔。
